thread.title: Infographic: World Statistics Day 2015 -- Census Bureau
thread.title_full: Infographic: World Statistics Day 2015 -- Census Bureau - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Infographic: World Statistics Day 2015 -- Census Bureau
text:
U.S. Census Bureau
WASHINGTON , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- The U.S. Census Bureau joins statistical organizations throughout the world to celebrate the second World Statistics Day today.
This interactive infographic is a compilation of news graphics that highlights the wide range of ways the Census Bureau supports this year's theme of "Better data. Better lives."
The Census Bureau uses statistics to provide critical and timely information about the people, places and economy of the United States .
For more information on World Statistics Day 2015 , please see the links provided below.
Press kit Infographic: World Statistics Day 2015 Facts for Features: *Special Edition* World Statistics Day: Oct. 20, 2015 | PDF Version Video: Statistics All Around Us Official United Nations World Statistics Day 2015 Website No news release associated with this product. Tip Sheet only.
Public Information Office
